identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a POS system that feels like a physical tool, not a spreadsheet. Prioritize tactile feedback, high-contrast legibility, and speed.

usage.headings: Chivo, font-weight: 700, tracking-tight. Use for Page Titles and Major Section Headers.
usage.body: Inter, font-weight: 400/500. Use for labels, descriptions, and general UI text.
usage.numbers: JetBrains Mono, font-weight: 500. CRITICAL: Use for ALL prices, totals, and quantities to ensure tabular alignment.
usage.ui_elements: Inter, font-weight: 600. Use for Buttons and Navigation.

pos_screen.left_panel: w-full md:w-2/3 p-6 grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 overflow-y-auto
pos_screen.right_panel: w-full md:w-1/3 bg-white border-l border-slate-200 flex flex-col shadow-xl z-10

ProductCard.description: A tactile card representing a product. Must feel 'pressable'.
ProductCard.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 hover:border-blue-500 hover:shadow-md transition-all cursor-pointer active:scale-95
ProductCard.content: Image (aspect-square object-cover rounded-t-lg), Title (font-bold truncate), Price (font-mono text-blue-600)

TicketItem.description: A row in the current bill/invoice.
TicketItem.style: flex justify-between items-center p-3 border-b border-slate-100 last:border-0

ScannerOverlay.description: The camera view for barcode scanning.
ScannerOverlay.style: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border-2 border-blue-500 shadow-inner bg-black/5
ScannerOverlay.animation: Scanning laser line (red) moving up and down.

login_background.usage: Login page split-screen background with blue overlay

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for the main background. Use solid, clean colors for high contrast.
Ensure all interactive elements have a `data-testid` for testing.
Use `sonner` for all toast notifications (Success: 'Invoice Printed', Error: 'Scan Failed').
Mobile First: The POS screen must be fully functional on a phone screen (stack the grid above the ticket summary).
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1. The blue primary color is chosen to meet this on white.
Animation: Use `framer-motion` for the 'Add to Cart' effect. The product image should fly to the cart icon.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' for icons. 2. Install 'recharts' for the dashboard. 3. Use 'react-qr-barcode-scanner' or similar for the camera functionality. 4. Implement the 'Cobalt Professional' theme by updating the CSS variables in index.css first.
